EmailTemplate.name: APJ_Event_ANZ_FSI Luncheon_Q414.01 Invite
EmailTemplate.subject: Join Us: Pivotal Executive Luncheon Series
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
<http://connect.pivotal.io/APJ_Event_ANZ_FSI-luncheons_Q414_Registration.html> Dear {{lead.First Name:default=Sir/Madam}},
With competition heating up in the Australian Financial Services & Insurance markets, you need to improve and speed up the innovation cycle. This speed will be a determining factor in maximizing your customer experience and thus acquiring and retaining customers. Big Data is the key to this. But how do you best leverage it?
Register now <http://connect.pivotal.io/APJ_Event_ANZ_FSI-luncheons_Q414_Registration.html> to join Phil Gomm, <http://connect.pivotal.io/APJ_Event_ANZ_FSI-luncheons_Q414_Registration.html#Phil%20Gomm> Capgemini's Financial Services Practice Lead for Australia and New Zealand, Surinder Singh, <http://connect.pivotal.io/APJ_Event_ANZ_FSI-luncheons_Q414_Registration.html#Surinder%20Singh> Capgemini Director and Big Data Lead, and Sean Lee, <http://connect.pivotal.io/APJ_Event_ANZ_FSI-luncheons_Q414_Registration.html#Sean%20Lee> Head of Product Strategy and FSI Lead APJ at one of our exclusive luncheons to discover the new technologies available to maximize your innovation plans.
The keynotes will cover the current opportunity of Big Data for Financial Services. It will look at Big Data value drivers and hypotheses, how Financial Services organisations can initiate a Big Data program and some ideas to get you jump started. The keynote will also delve into recent research that Cap Gemini has conducted around the 2014 Capgemini World Payments Report.
Event Details:
Melbourne:
Date: Tuesday 25th November 2014
Time: 12.15 for registration with 12.30pm start – 2.30pm
Location: Rockpool Private Terrace
Address: Rockpool bar & grill, Crown Complex, Southbank <http://www.rockpool.com/rockpoolbarandgrillmelbourne/>
Sydney:
Date: Wednesday 26th November 2014
Time: 12.15 for registration with 12.30pm start – 2.30pm
Location: GPO Wine Room
Address: GPO Sydney, No.1 Martin Place, Sydney <http://www.gposydney.com/>
Register Now >> <http://connect.pivotal.io/APJ_Event_ANZ_FSI-luncheons_Q414_Registration.html>
We hope you can join us,
The Pivotal Team
